Name: Container with Osiris figure
Description: This 'reliquary' is a combination of an enthroned Osiris and an obelisk. Osiris is seated on a throne, which instead of a back has an obelisk The latter is hollow and is closed at the back by a lid. The Osiris figure is gilded. The front of the obelisk is painted red. Inside it was a light-coloured strip of linen, a dark painted bundle of textile with white feathers and the remains of resin, as well as a wooden statuette depicting Isis with Harpocrates.
